q: Congressional Progressive Caucus sent a letter to Barack Obama last week requesting a meeting before Tuesday's address for the sole purpose of discussing Social Security. Barack Obama Sheldon Whitehouse ( D-R.I.) said while he's looking forward to a bipartisan process going forward in the next two years, but we also look forward to the president showing strong leadership on critical issues and being willing to stand and fight on points where he is-- feels that's the in the best interest of the nation. Sheldon Whitehouse and Sen. Bernie Sanders said they support a move such as eliminating the cap on the maximum taxable earnings as a way to close the cost gap of Social Security down the road. "We were just thrilled to be by her side," Debbie Wasserman Schultz recalled of her visit to the hospital Wednesday night, along with House Minority Leader Nancy Pelosi and New York Barack Obama Kirsten Gillibrand . And we were prepared to do and say anything- if she could hear us- to provide comfort and encouragement. Gabrielle Giffords lay in her hospital bed with her eyes closed, swathed in bandages. With her was her husband, Mark Kelly. The three women gathered around her, Debbie Wasserman Schultz recalled in an interview.
